doc.name: SensorDataCalibration
doc.description:
This actor receives values from the bend sensors and accelerometer/gyroscope of a data glove and outputs corrected and filtered data.

The code generator supplies the method contents, thus this class has no methods.
doc.author: Robert Bui
doc.port: The finger1Input input port. The type is int.
